In fact, he hardly states the case
strongly enough. A man is lucky
who uses the shower-baths after
live-fifteen and finds any hot water.
It means that at least two-thirds
of those who wish to take a bath
have no hot water. The causes
seem to be many.
In the first place, some of the
‘`prep" school lacrosse teams use
the cage early in the afternoon and
thus use up part of the hot water.

thirdly, the only storage facilities

then, we suggest that the University authorities take the matter up
